attributes.action: ensure that dictionaries are not subject to censorship of any kind, as they reflect language and do not create it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is in the context of McDonalds seeking to have the expression "mcjob" removed from the Oxford English Dictionary on the grounds that it unfairly represents their employment strategies and practices

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
